name: Geometry Genious
technology: HTML || Javascript || Tailwind CSS || Vs Code || Chrome Dev Tools
key_features_heading: The Geometry Genius is a geometry calculation website
key_features: Here we have seen six geometries like: Triangle, Rectangle, Parallelogram, Rhombus, Pentagon, Ellipse.

It will calculate according to the calculation of geometry. Here we will calculate some by default and if we give a number inside some input fields, it will calculate us according to that number and give us the answer in our 'Area Calculation' section.
If we mouse hover the geometries, different colors are displayed

name: Technology Store
technology: HTML || CSS || Tailwind CSS || Flowbite || Chrome Dev Tools || Vs code || RESTful APIs || Font Awesome
key_features_heading: Technology Store is a collection of technology websites
key_features: Store text with technology in the banner is animated like this by setting setInterval through Java Script
Then clicking the I button in the technology card section will show the details of that specific technology
And if we want we can bookmark that specific technology and it will be there even if we reload because we did it with local storage.
